title: Customized Visual Language Microlearning Course for Older Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental smartphone usage skills and basic language learning experience
context.additional_context: Language education curriculum emphasizing visual learning elements in smartphone-based, limited-technology environments, structured with step-by-step guidance and graphic materials for real-life application.

learning_goals: Learners independently navigate core language learning menus on a mobile app within 3 seconds.
Learners interpret visual examples (images/infographics) with 85% accuracy and explain context-specific expressions.
After completing weekly microlearning modules, learners generate five or more practical sentences applicable to real-life scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
